txt.en:
[placeholder],

I have a task that needs attention, and I thought of you immediately. Report to me in the Bree Jail, and I will explain what must be done.

Daisy Appledore
'It is good of you to come. This matter is deserving of attention, and I believe that you will succeed at seeing this through.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to her. Apparently, there is something that she wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Daisy Appledore
Daisy Appledore sent you a letter requesting that you visit her at Bree Jail.\n\nDeliver the letter to Daisy Appledore within the Bree Jail.
